level.heading: Consumer information to reflect actual charges.
level.text: A pharmacy may charge any current selling price, discount, service availability or service charge, at any time; provided, that the poster and sources of consumer information are adjusted accordingly.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 10, 1976, D.C. Law 1-81, title I, ยง 106, 23 DCR 2460.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-804.51.
